localResource.name: startDate
localResource.label: startDate
localResource.queryString: SELECT Distinct cast(date_trunc('month', o.the_date) as date) as active_months FROM calendar as o WHERE o.the_date >= coalesce((SELECT date_trunc('month',a.var_datetime) FROM History_configuration as a WHERE a.var_name = 'firstSync'), to_timestamp('01/01/2219', 'DD/MM/YYYY')) AND o.the_date <= coalesce((SELECT date_trunc('month',a.var_datetime) FROM History_configuration as a WHERE a.var_name = 'lastHourAggr'), to_timestamp('01/01/2219', 'DD/MM/YYYY')) ORDER BY active_months DESC
